p: In studies related with Ecuadorian liverwort Nagashima et al. [ 13, 18] report that the compounds 3,4-Dimethoxy-1-vinylbenzene, 2,4,5-trimethoxy-1-vinylbenzene and apigenin-7,4â€²-dimethylether were identified in Marchesinia brachiate. 1,4-Dimethylazulene was isolated from Plagiochila micropterys and Macrolejeunea pallescens. The major component of Marchantia plicata is marchantin A and pinguisane-type sesquiterpenoid is the major component in Plagiochila alternans.
